scenes.narration: Welcome to your first lesson at Chatting Wizard School. In this video, we'll explain what OnlyFans is and how it works.

scenes.heading: OnlyFans is a Content Platform
points: Creators share exclusive photos and videos
Fans pay a monthly subscription to access
Creators can also sell individual content (PPV)
scenes.narration: OnlyFans is a social media platform where creators share exclusive content with their fans. Fans pay a monthly subscription fee to see this content. Creators can also sell individual pieces of content, called pay-per-view, or PPV.

scenes.heading: Where Does the Money Come From?
points: Subscriptions: fans pay monthly to follow a creator
Tips: fans send extra money to show appreciation
Custom content: personalized photos or videos
scenes.narration: The money comes from four main sources. First, subscriptions, where fans pay a monthly fee. Second, pay-per-view content, which are individual photos or videos that fans can unlock. Third, tips, which fans send as a bonus. And fourth, custom content, where fans pay for personalized photos or videos.

scenes.heading: Your Role as a Chatter
points: You chat with fans AS the model
You build relationships and keep fans engaged
You are the main revenue driver
scenes.narration: As a chatter, you are the person behind the screen talking to fans. You chat as if you are the model. Your job is to build a connection with each fan, keep them interested, and sell content through natural conversation. You are the main reason fans spend money.

scenes.title: Lesson Complete!
scenes.subtitle: Next: What Does a Chatter Do?
scenes.narration: Great job! You now understand what OnlyFans is and why your role matters. In the next lesson, we'll dive deeper into what a chatter does day to day.
